I might add LinkedIn support later on, but it will take a while.

comments.html:
There's ton of free stuff on my web site, from videos and presentations to blog posts. You'll find some of that at blog.ipspace.net and demo.ipspace.net (and of course you can register to download the book ;).

Enjoy! Ivan
